title: Spectate problem
body: So recently I've been trying to spectate my friends and I can't. The loading screen remains black and pops out a message that says "connection to spectator server failed.Would you like to retry?" I have switched accounts and desktops even but the problem persists.Has this something to do with the specific server? Im playing on EUNE.Let me know if you are facing the same problem and share any solution if its not a server problem if you could.Thanks in advance.

replies.body: i left spectating and it says that im spectating pls help i cant play lol

> [{quoted}](name=GUCI TI SE SMUCI,realm=EUNE,application-id=okOuNvuT,discussion-id=rEGcpmkE,comment-id=0007,timestamp=2019-07-02T15:48:34.929+0000)
>
> i left spectating and it says that im spectating pls help i cant play lol

It sounds like the issue you're reporting is quite different from the OP's Spectator Mode woes. This variant you've noticed where you're stuck in spectator mode is something we're troubleshooting and investigating at the moment. Can you try a few things to see if it helps? These have been ordered from least intrusive to more:

1) Disable the "Close client during game" feature:

 * Navigate to the "General section"
 * Disable "Close client during game"
 * Re-log into League of Legends

2) Reset local League Client settings:

 - Log into League
 - Navigate to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config
 - Once there they will need to delete the LeagueClientSettings.yaml file
 - Attempt to load into a custom game

3) Reset all your configuration settings (Your hotkeys and in-game settings will reset as well):

 - Log into League
 - Navigate to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends
 - Delete the Config folder
 - Attempt to load into a custom game

If any of the three things fixed it, can you tell me which one did the trick?

If your issue persists, it'd be super helpful if you could gather some logs from your computer and reach out to my colleagues through the [Support Site](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). Please download and install our [Hextech Repair Tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool). We also have a video guide on how to use it [here!](http://bit.ly/2thtj6h)

i had the same problem. It didnt matter if i changed accounts or servers.
In the end after trying full repair and restore defaults, i deleted from the game folder "Logs" and "Config" and it somehow worked
Yo I have the same problem some Nani-shit by right here, I don't understand
same thing here, i was trying to spectate, black screen and typical windows sound, i reset league and still shows that i spectate, that game is over for 20min. or more{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}
The problem seems to be related to which regions client you have downloaded from riot. My spectator mode works on Euw servers, but does not work on Eune servers.
same problem and no solution till now
I ve had the same problem for a month

How long has this been happening? It could be a problem on Riot's end. Wait a day or so, and see if the problem persists. 

-----

If it is still happening after as a day, and is only happening in spectate mode, it could be a corrupt file. Try running a client repair by opening the client (no need to log in), click the gear in the top right corner, and press "initiate full repair".


----

If that doesn't help, then it is most likely a connection issue. it is highly recommended that you start with the [Hextech Repair Tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) by Riot Support. This will create proper firewall exceptions, scan your connection settings, etc., fixing a wide variety of common connection issues.

---------


If the problem isn't fixed by the repair tool, try out Riot Support's [Connection Troubleshooting Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues). It goes over common problems and their solutions one-by-one.


-----

Worst case scenario, attach the **logs** generated by the **Hextech Repair Tool** to a [Support Ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). This will give Riot detailed info about your connection and your system, and allow them to figure out what the problem is.

For several days (~9) spectate does not work. In particular, there is no news from Rioters themselves.

In the logs such an error. And it is on another server (RU).

>###* ERROR| Failed to connect to 185.40.64.165 (185.40.64.165).  Timeout duration (ms): 10000  [](https://.)  ERROR| ReplayNetClient GetServerVersion error. Could not send HTTP request. Error: 16389 [](https://.) ERROR| Timeout while waiting for replay system to get game metadata.*
It is so easy just unistall and reinstall lol it works to me
